mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y'
SELECT CATEGORY_CODE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CREATEDATE, COUNT FROM TB_BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(BOARD_NO) FROM TB_BOARD JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, B.UPDATE_DATE, B.STATUS, MEMBER_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, COUNT FROM TB_BOARD B JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
